25810.name: Europa Universalis III: Western - AD 1400 Spritepack
25810.description:
These 16 historically authentic models have new animations for a more realistic and improved game atmosphere. Units are equipped with swords, shields, daggers, armour, chain mails, jerkins, capes, basinets and pig face basinets.

Key Features:

This spritepack includes 16 new sprites for the Western European Nations in the 15th century of EUIII. There are unique uniforms for:
  • Venice
  • France
  • Scandinavia
  • England
  • Netherlands
  • Portugal
  • Spain
  • Prussia
  • Britain
  • Sweden
  • Denmark
  • Scotland
  • Austria
  • Teutonic Order
  • Brandenburg
  • And a generic one
